authors.author: Thomas Gossmann Extends IBaseLabelProvider with the methods to provide the text and/or image for the label of a given element. Used by most structured viewers, except table viewers.

method.name: ILabelProvider.getImage
method.description: Returns the image for the label of the given element

param.name: element
param.description: the element for which to provide the label image

method.return: the image used to label the element, or null if there is no image for the given object

method.name: ILabelProvider.getText
method.description: Returns the text for the label of the given element.

param.name: element
param.description: the element for which to provide the label text

method.return: the text string used to label the element, or null if there is no text label for the given object
